org.apache.pig.impl.util.avro

Class AvroBagWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.impl.util.avro.AvroBagWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of objects in Avro array
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable, Iterable<Tuple>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable, DataBag, Spillable

    public final class AvroBagWrapper<T>
extends Object
implements DataBag
    Class that implements the Pig bag interface, wrapping an Avro array. Designed to reduce data copying.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
